short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Knife And Jemes is an attractive Casual game with simple game play. The gameplay is simple and understandable for the player.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Knife And Jemes is an attractive Casual game with simple gameplay. The gameplay is simple and understandable for the player. You can create more stages for the game or customize it as you wish, for this please read the documentations. During the game, You have to Merge the Jemes.

About the Game:
Simple and fun gameplay
Playable with most browsers
Simple and beautiful design

Game features:
Beautiful vector design: all parts of the game are designed in the Adobe Illustrator software that you receive with the project.

https://codecanyon.net/item/knife-and-jemes/54420830
